topRight.title: CV Template Use
topRight.body: I also have experience of being used in CV templates. Use the GitHub link to the left of this paragraph to find out more!

bottomLeft.title: Stock Image
bottomLeft.body: One of my greatest assets is the fact that I am, in fact, a stock image. This image is inserted by a direct URL to the (royalty-free) shutterstock image used in this example, but can be replaced with any other URL.

bottomRight.title: Customisation
bottomRight.body: You may want to customise the sizes of elements in this section. Use the 'avatarSize' prop to set a custom width for the avatar, or the 'topSplitRatio' and 'bottomSplitRatio' props to change where the multicolumn split lies.

skills.additionalText: I used it to build this CV!
Well I guess it is actually kinda useful, but it's a pretty common skill to have

props.text: I learned lots of stuff at university, and also a few things
Organised and catalogued the systematic and thorough cleaning of every telephone handset in the company.
Transfer from planitary surface onto B Ark in order to avoid enormous mutant star-goat
